Topic.Title: Peer to Peer or Co-op game with quest.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I've known about Quest for a few years. I used it a little and thought to myself this is great software.

One thing I have been waiting on is a re-implementation of multiplayer for creating Quest games.

I did a forum search on the subject and there was a multiplayer component in Quest 4 but was never worked on further. 

I saw this post: http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/samples/topic/4013/online-multiplayer-w-node-js

Does anyone use this currently? Does it still work? Has Quest 5 updated to the point where that node.js multiplayer workaround doesn't function anymore?

Please let me know, thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, I've known about Quest for a few years. I used it a little and thought to myself this is great software.

One thing I have been waiting on is a re-implementation of multiplayer for creating Quest games.

I did a forum search on the subject and there was a multiplayer component in Quest 4 but was never worked on further.

Does anyone use this currently? Does it still work? Has Quest 5 updated to the point where that node.js multiplayer workaround doesn't function anymore?

Please let me know, thanks.

Posts.EditableText: It should still work. I don't know of anyone using it, but to the extent it was developed, it seemed to work.
Posts.HTML: It should still work. I don't know of anyone using it, but to the extent it was developed, it seemed to work.
